description.diamond-pearl:
If it is the opposite
gender of the user,
the foe is charmed
into sharply lowering
its Sp. Atk stat.

gender of the user, it is charmed, which
harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.
